links.title: Apple Now Runs On 100% Green Energy, And Here's How It Got There
links.description: You have to see Apple's Reno, Nevada, data center from the inside to truly understand how huge it is. It's made up of five long white buildings sitting side by side on a dry scrubby landscape just off I-80, and the corridor that connects them through the middle is a quarter-mile long.

messages.body: Editor's Choice: Will Spotify Ever Generate Profits?  @sramana $SPOT $P Also $AAPL $GOOGL https://t.co/bxT2Ev5Ctw

links.title: Will Spotify Ever Generate Profits?
links.description: Spotify's valuation and user base may be rising, but that is not spelling an end to its losses. Since inception, the company has amassed an accumulated deficit of €2.43 billion (~$2.98 billion).

messages.body: $AAPL
Where these whipsaws are taking us and how to trade it: http://crackedmarket.com/2018/04/what-to-make-of-these-whipsaws/ $SPY $SPX $ES_F $QQQ $IWM $AAPL $FB $AMZN $BTC.X

links.title: What to make of these whipsaws
links.description: Free After-Hours Analysis: The S&P500's whipsaw continues as Monday's fizzle turned into Tuesday's surge. On Monday the market opened strong following a weekend where tariff headlines cooled. Unfortunately the relief was short-lived because a FBI raid on Trump's personal lawyer sent the market tumbling from its early highs.

links.title: Cramer Remix: Amazon's punishment isn't warranted - the stock is a buy
links.description: With scandals and pseudo-scandals swirling at Facebook, Tesla and Amazon, CNBC's Jim Cramer wanted to inspect each household company to gauge the potential negative impacts. "With all three names rebounding nicely today along with the rest of the market, ... I think we need to conduct a damage assessment," the " Mad Money" host said on Tuesday.

links.title: Federal Reserve proposes new capital rules for Wall Street
links.description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The Federal Reserve on Tuesday proposed new rules that could allow some large banks to reduce the amount of capital they must hold as a cushion against a future economic shock.

messages.body: $AAPL Court Hands $502M Judgement Against Apple in FaceTime Lawsuit https://utbblogs.com/court-judgement-against-apple-facetime/ via @UTBblogs

links.title: Court Hands $502M Judgement Against Apple in FaceTime Lawsuit - UTB Blogs
links.description: VirtnetX awarded $502 Million dollar judgement against Apple from patent infringement lawsuit. This patent infringement case has gone on for 8 years has seen appeals and cases overturned. This latest decision again see's Apple take the loss. The claimant, VirtnetX Holding Corp. claimed that Apple had infringed upon several of it's patents.
